name: Expert C# Engineer (Remote)
description:
Spark Equation is a software-enabled IT and strategy consulting firm operating at the intersection of strategy, product design, and engineering to optimize solutions for small and medium-sized businesses. We harness data, analytics, and engineering expertise to give organizations a clear path to gain industry leadership and improve performance.

We believe in Building Software That Works® through precision, innovation, and an engineering mindset. Engaging and empowering intelligent, bold, and passionate people to do the right things, a better way.

We are in search of an experienced Expert C# Engineer to re-platform the 5-year-old product that supports 2 mln users to ensure that they can grow 10x the size they are right now.
Рroduct - a single platform that allows you to automate the work of a management company.

Responsibilities:

  • Developing and working with existing projects, participating in testing and deployment

  • Development of architectural solutions

  • Code review

Requirements:

  • Confident knowledge and experience in C# development from 6 years

  • Ability to make independent architectural and technical decisions

  • Understanding and ability to work with business requirements

  • Experience with ASP.NET Core, EF, MS SQL

  • Good knowledge of architectural patterns

  • English is not lower than Upper Intermediate

  • Desire to work remotely in a distributed team

  • Ability and desire to share experience and knowledge with the team

  • Experience of transition from monolithic architecture to SOA/Microservices

  • Working with Azure cloud and services.

Nice to have:

  • Experience working with other programming languages. At least one of the following Python, Java, JS/TS

  • Experience working with NoSQL databases

  • Knowledge of frontend frameworks

  • TDD

  • Experience with containerization and virtualization systems

We offer:

  • Become part of a strong team

  • The ability to influence the design and quality of the product, to see the result of their work

  • The possibility of professional and career growth

  • Work only with foreign customers according to modern standards

Benefits:

  • Remote work, 5/2, from 10.00 to 19.00 Moscow time

  • Official registration, white salary, paid vacation

  • VHI policy with dentistry (after passing the probationary period)

  • Regular salary review based on the result of work

  • Annual budget for each employee for development and education

  • Opportunity to participate in Russian and international conferences

  • Possible business trips to the office in Chicago, USA (after the pandemic)

Interview stages:

  • HR interview

  • Technical interview with coding

  • Final interview with СЕО

  • Offer
